page.title: 02A Day in my Life.
page.content: A Saturday. I would get up at 7.30 am and have breakfast at 8.30. I normally have Branflakes for breakfast. At 10.00 we go for a ride. Sometimes we go along the air field. The airfield was used in the Second World War. I hate to think of all the people being killed. There is a runway stretching all the way round the enormous field. There are sheep grazing on it now but it will never be used again. I hope there will never be a war again. When we get home it would be lunch time. It is normally bread and cheese for lunch, lunch is about 1.30pm. After lunch I would help Dad or Mum in the garden. We have three acres of land, mostly wood. At 4.00pm we go down to Fordwells on our bikes and do the horses. When we get back we have our supper. Mum is a vegetarian.
